message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great value, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to go a bit lower? I'm thinking around $82?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make a slightly smaller concession. I can offer it to you for $84.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to go a bit lower? I'm thinking around $81?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $83.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $82?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $82.50.
